item.description:
We had a fabulous turnout last year and we hope to see all of you again and we would love to see new faces this year too.  There will be a 9 hole scramble style, cart and Buffet-$70.00 per person. Buffet Only -$ 30.00  The food was awesome last year and so were all of the attendees. 

 

Chicken

Corn on the Cob

Ribs

Side Dishes

Tee Sponsor-$ 100.00 or other small contributions

For Directions to the Club visit www.grassmerecountryclub.com

For more information please visit SOH at www.survivorsofHomicide.org

Payments and form need to be returned by May 26, 2012

Your tax  deductible donation can be made out to Survivors of Homicide,

530 Silas Deane Hwy, Wethersfield, CT 06109

 

This is the link for the registration form:

 

Respectfully,

 

Arthur Jensen & Judi Murphy

 

http://www.survivorsofhomicide.com/NewSite/Forms/2012%20SOH%20%Charity%Golf%Tournament%20Registration.pdf

 

We hope to see all of you there !!
item.how_to_find_us: Mapquest or call Grassmere County Club
item.name: Charity Golf Tournament - To Benefit Survivors of Homicide
